text: Arboys-en-Bugey is a commune in the Ain department of eastern France, in the Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes. It was incorporated on 1 January 2016 by the combination of the former communes of Arbignieu and Saint-Bois.Arrêté préfectoral 29 September 2015 ==Related pages== *Communes of the Ain department ==References== Category:2016 establishments in France
title: Arboys-en-Bugey
